Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the grid corresponding to a warehouse layout of aisles;
    holds an array of Nodes (intersections); uses ArrayList to calculate shortest path length.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static int BIG
      larger than any path in the network
      static int bigX
      Maximuim x coordinate used by constructor, recalc, neighbor
      static int bigY
      Maximuim y coordinate used by constructor, recalc, neighbor
      private Node destination
      set by setDestination(), used by recalc();
      private java.util.ArrayList<Node> list
      used by recalc()
      Node[][] nodes
      holds the Nodes, indexed by grid coordinates

      Grid(int lengthX, int lengthY)

      • getDestination

        public Node getDestination()

      • neighbor

        private Node neighbor(Node aNode,
            int direction)
        returns the neighbor of aNode; the direction is a number (0,1,2,3)
        multiple of 90 degrees from the X axis. direction 0 is +X, direction 1 is +Y etc If out of bounds, the neighbor is null
        Parameters:
        node - the node
        direction - of the neighbor

      • recalc

        void recalc()
        calculate shortest distance from all nodes to destination;
        uses list, node. Calls neighbor(), node.newDistance(),list.add((), list.removeFirst()
